title: Home
text:
Hi there! Welcome to my personal website, where I share my journey, projects, and thoughts.



My Favourite Picture





Explore my projects and learn about what I’ve been working on.
Read my reflections on various experiences.
Get to know more about me and my interests.




One of my most exciting projects is my Final Year Project (FYP), where I developed and enhanced multiple Phaser games for the People’s Association Heartland Orientation Trail Website. This project aimed to engage over 300 Permanent Residents (PRs) and non-residents, helping them assimilate into Singapore’s culture and explore its places of interest.



Game Development: Designed and enhanced Phaser games to improve user engagement and learning.
Technology Proficiency: Utilized programming languages like Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C#, and SQL for development and data analysis.
Deployment: Deployed the website on Firebase for real-time database management.
Impact: Improved user engagement and learning experience by 45%.




Check out the games I developed on the Heartland Orientation Trail Website.



Let’s Explore Singapura!

title: Travel Adventures
text:
I love traveling and exploring new places. Here are a few of my favorite destinations:



Known for the Eiffel Tower, rich history, and delicious pastries.
Highlights:

Visiting the Louvre Museum.
Strolling along the Seine River.
Enjoying authentic croissants.






A city of temples, shrines, and beautiful cherry blossoms.
Highlights:

Walking through the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove.
Experiencing traditional tea ceremonies.
Exploring Fushimi Inari Shrine.






Famous for its breathtaking sunsets and white-washed buildings.
Highlights:

Watching sunsets in Oia.
Relaxing on the volcanic beaches.
Tasting local seafood and wines.







Here’s a few travel memories from one of my trips:
   ————————————————————————
Let me know if you’d like to hear more about my travel experiences!

title: About me
text:
About me
Hello! My name is Alenna, and I am 22 years old this year. I am currently studying in SIT Bachelor of Science in Applied Computing with Fintech Specialisation.


My favourite animal
I absolutely adore puppies! They bring joy, comfort, and unconditional love. Here’s a picture of my favorite puppy:



My Favorite Puppy




Education
I am passionate about learning and expanding my skill set in the following areas: - Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, C#, C++, Solidity and many more!! - Fintech Concepts: Blockchain, Digital Payments, Smart Contracts - Data Analytics: Machine Learning, Big Data Tools, Predictive Analytics
Through my academic journey, I’ve worked on exciting projects like creating Phaser games for interactive learning and leveraging data analytics to solve real-world problems.


Hobbies
When I’m not studying or working on projects, I enjoy the following:

Reading about financial technologies and their real-world applications.
Exploring new kdrama and american romantic comedy.
Spending time with my favorite people, especially family!



My Favourite Music Playlist

title: Reflections
text:
This year, I’ve learned the importance of self-reflection and continuous growth. Here are some of my reflections:



Life often throws challenges our way. Facing these challenges has taught me resilience and the value of perseverance.





Practicing gratitude helps me appreciate the small joys in life. From spending time with loved ones to achieving personal milestones, I’ve learned to value these moments.

title: Reflections
text:
Personal Growth
This year, I’ve learned the importance of self-reflection and continuous growth. Here are some of my key reflections:

Finding Joy in the Small Things

Life can be hectic, but spending time with loved ones or even a furry friend brings immense joy.
Here’s a picture of my favorite puppy that always brightens my day:

title: Reflections
text:
Reflection on Using GenAI

Benefits

Efficiency: Generative AI helps me complete tasks faster by providing quick, relevant solutions.
Learning: It offers simplified explanations for complex concepts.
Creativity: It inspires new ideas and unique approaches to solving problems.



Challenges

Over-reliance: Balancing between using AI and independent thinking is crucial.
Verification: Ensuring accuracy is essential, as AI occasionally provides incorrect outputs.

title: Reflections
text:
Looking Ahead
I hope to carry the lessons I’ve learned into the future—embracing challenges, staying resilient, and appreciating life’s simple joys (like spending time with puppies!).
Thank you for reading my reflections.
